name: Shoot N' Get Shot
description:
This Game Was Made For Ludum Dare 43

The theme was Sacrifices must be made

So I made a top down shooter game were you shoot you take damage, 

You need to try to dodge the enemies bullets and have the enemies hit each other

so you dont need to waste health/ammo.

* There is no music because I cant make music

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys = Movements

Left Click = Shoot
